channel.title: Quick help
channel.description: Hey It's been awhile since I've been coding or else I'd remember this but where do i search for in npchandler to change the dying anims?

item.title: Quick help
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

try that?

                    } else if (npcs[i].npcType == 2026) { // Barrows Dharok
                        npcs[i].animNumber = 3419;

or

            } else if (npcs[i].IsDead == true) {
                if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == false
                        && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false) {

i think thats it O.o

Read full topic
